metadata.title: Application of Ionic Liquids in Multicomponent Reactions

abstract.original_text: This chapter reports the applicability of ionic liquids in the formation of different types of multicomponent reactions. Easy work-up, relatively short reaction times, good to high yields of the desired products, mild reaction conditions, low cost, availability, and reusability of the employed ionic liquids are the striking features of the reported methodologies.
